trans-unit.source: Implements an accessible object that <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> classes use to adjust the designer user interface for users who have impairments.
trans-unit.target: Implementa acessível a um objeto que <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> classes utilizam para ajustar a interface de utilizador estruturador para utilizadores com deficiências.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerAccessibleObject"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerAccessibleObject"> </xref> classe utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> to apply to the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> aplicar para o objeto acessível.

trans-unit.source: Returns the child accessible object associated with the activity designer at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o objeto acessível subordinado associado com o designer de atividade no local o índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the child accessible object.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do objeto subordinado acessível.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> associated with the child <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> associado o subordinado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> na localização de índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of child accessible objects that belong to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerAccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o número de objetos de acessível subordinados que pertençam ao <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerAccessibleObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of children that belong to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerAccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de elementos subordinados que pertençam ao <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerAccessibleObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the accessible state of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerAccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado da atual acessível <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerAccessibleObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: State has the following possible values: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>.
trans-unit.target: Estado tem os seguintes valores possíveis: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>
